titleStmt.title: The Coppie of a letter sent from one of the queenes servants at the Hague to a gentleman in Westminster dated the second of May, 1642 whereunto is added two strange prophesies concerning these times : with the predictions of Henry of Huntington / written by Tho. Asladowne in the year of our Lord 1556.

The Coppie of a letter sent from one of the queenes servants at the Hague to a gentleman in Westminster dated the second of May, 1642 whereunto is added two strange prophesies concerning these times : with the predictions of Henry of Huntington / written by Tho. Asladowne in the year of our Lord 1556.
titleStmt.author: Asladowne, Thomas. A prophesie of Tho. Asladowne written in the year of our Lord 1556.
M. M.
Henry of Huntingdon, 1084?-1155.

notesStmt.note: Although given on the t.p. as author, Asladowne only wrote A prophecie of Tho. Asladowne.
The preditions of Henry of Huntingdon is in Latin.
A letter from the Hague signed: M.M. -- A prophecie concerning these times -- Henr. Huntingdonensis hist. l. 6 initio -- A prophecie of Tho. Asladowne written in the year of our Lord, 1556.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
